sentences.en: Bertha was disinclined to treat the matter lightly.
sentences.cn: 轻描淡写地对待这件事使伯莎感到厌恶.

sentences.en: He gave me a disinclined assistance.
sentences.cn: 他很不情愿地给了我帮助.

sentences.en: He had a disinclined smile on his face.
sentences.cn: 他脸上带着一丝勉强的微笑.

sentences.en: He is disinclined to be photographed.
He was disinclined to talk about himself, especially to his students.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢谈论他自己，尤其是当着他学生的面。

sentences.en: He was strongly disinclined to believe anything that she said.
sentences.cn: 她说什么他都坚决不肯相信。

sentences.en: He was yoked to an disinclined partner.
sentences.cn: 他不得不与一位不情愿的伙伴合作.

sentences.en: Her delicate constitution disinclined her from such an arduous job.
sentences.cn: 她纤弱的体质使得她不欲担任如此艰巨的工作.

sentences.en: I feel disinclined for an argument.
I had been talking all morning, I was disinclined for many argument.
sentences.cn: 我谈了一上午, 不愿再争辩了.

sentences.en: I was disinclined to talk to Sam about it.
sentences.cn: 我不愿与萨姆谈这件事。

sentences.en: She felt disinclined, almost repelled, by the thought of intimacies and scenes of contacts.
sentences.cn: 一想到跟人家亲近,酬酢往返,她就觉得讨厌, 甚至觉得厌恶.

sentences.en: She is, to some degree , disinclined to believe me.
The hot weather made me feel disinclined for work.
sentences.cn: 炎热的天气使我不想工作.

sentences.en: They are disinclined to use violence because it is against their Buddhist faith.
sentences.cn: 他们不愿意使用暴力，因为这么做违背他们的佛教信仰。

sentences.en: Well, I feel rather disinclined to talk about the accident.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 我觉得很不愿意谈这次事故.

words.tran_cn: 使不愿；使不欲；不感兴趣

trans.tran_en: If you are disinclined to do something, you do not want to do it
